price: ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ ߗߍߕߊ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߦߊ߬ߞߎߓߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߗߍ ߘߏ߫ ߕߊ߬ ، ߌ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߌ߬ߢߍ߬ߡߊ߬ߕߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
